p: In addition, NPs such as TiO 2, Ag, and Au can reduce the risk of high mortality among patients with COVID-19 due to hyperactivity of blood platelets which can lead to the formation of deadly blood clots (Akinola et al. 2020; Ojo et al. 2016). Moreover, serious complications such as heart attacks and strokes can be also suppressed (Elegbede et al. 2020). Coagulation of blood through lysis of blood clots can significantly-reduce the severity of COVID-19.
